website_summaries.verdict: This all-inclusive shopping basket showcases a number of helpful accessories alongside  high-quality construction.
pros: Reinforced structure stays upright, even when not being used
Includes feet to help keep bag standing
cons: Straps are too short to hang around shoulder

customer_reviews.title: Just the right size for me. SEE UPDATE!
customer_reviews.text: This basket is just the right size to fit in my large mobility scooter basket. I use it for grocery shopping. So for, it's been plenty strong enough for what I'm using it for. Folding up & down is literally a "snap", with an elastic strap to hold it folded down. Some other reviews have experienced failures with the struts, but so far, mine have behaved well. Just don't rough-house it & it will probably last a long time. UPDATE 2/'18: Mine suffered the strut failure that folks are complaining about. This basket was only used a couple of times a month & then, always with care. There's no way to repair. It's shot. Downgrade to 2 stars!!
customer_reviews.author: Ron Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: Clever snap mechanism, but not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Had it just over a week and one side is already not holding the straight position after snapping into place. So disappointed! Did not use very many times (maybe four or five) so it was really a bummer. Clever idea, but not sturdy. It still works, but just sags on the one side. We will see how long before the other side goes.
customer_reviews.author: Franjan

customer_reviews.title: Great for sustainability, designed well, easy to use and store
customer_reviews.text: Recently, my county went to no plastic bags at the stores. This is a great alternative! I do my shopping, take it up to the register, and they bag it right back in the basket. The checkout employees really like the baskets because they stand up on their own and make it easy to place the groceries inside. I have 2 of these in my car and one that I use when I walk to the store for a quick grocery run. For anyone that is looking for sustainable alternatives, this fits in perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Love these baskets.
customer_reviews.text: These worked so well as shopping baskets and fit inside the grocery cart so well they have made shopping a breeze. I use them in the grocery cart to group my purchases and then the checkers just remove each item, scan it and return it to the basket. It's quick and easy to put in the car and to take in the house. They fold up small enough to fit in the car without taking up much space. I liked them so well I purchased a second set of 3 for various usages around the house. Keeps lots of things organized. I wish all colors were the same price. Seems the 'hot' colors are considerably higher priced.
customer_reviews.author: Evierose

customer_reviews.title: I immediately bought a second one!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this bag so much, I brought it to my parents' house to show them. I'm like a door-to-door snapbasket lady now :) Seriously, though, this thing owns. I live in an area where the "bag ban" is very real and stores are now charging as much as a dollar per paper bag. Ridiculous. This is the first tote I've ever owned that actually made me forget all my gripes about the bag ban. No folding, no floppiness, no worrying about it getting caught in the grocery conveyor. Long handles. Handy pocket to put your phone and keys in. Love.
customer_reviews.author: Katie W

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, folds compact, and fits the Keenz wagon!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this tote! I purchased it to use with my Keenz wagon for additional storage and it fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Alaina V.

customer_reviews.title: ... to the grocery store we get compliments on how nice they are
customer_reviews.text: Every time we take these to the grocery store we get compliments on how nice they are. You hear a snap whenever the sides lock/unlock. We haven't had any issues with them locking/unlocking when we don't want them to, unless I'm particularly klutzy that day, but that's totally user error so I won't blame that on the product. They fold up so they hardly take up any space and since they have an elastic band to keep them closed, they don't pop open when you take them out for a shopping trip.
customer_reviews.author: Rorian13

customer_reviews.title: WONDERFUL PRODUCT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I can not say enough wonderful things about this SnapBasket system!!! They will hold so much and handle the weight every time. If you are getting these you should also consider the Thermo Tote - it works great!! The thing I really love is that I can collapse 3 of these totes plus the thermal one and they slide right under my rear seat in my van. Love Love Them!!
customer_reviews.author: Vicki E

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: I like this for shopping. The store I go to requires your own bags and the staff who packs my groceries, always pick these bags first. My only concern is that the side clips slip every now and then, especially when you are emptying the bag. Got the turquoise and the gray and both colors are very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Skayc

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase, well worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I've had these bags for almost a year now and they have held up well. Sturdy, easy to clean and store. I can fit a shopping cart full of groceries into 3 bags. It makes having to bring in the groceries so much easier. It's also very easy for the baggers to put the groceries in.
customer_reviews.author: cV

customer_reviews.title: These are great for shopping
customer_reviews.text: These are great for shopping. I line them up at the checkout counter and sort my groceries as I pack them. They are much easier to carry into the house than grocery bags. I then fold them flat and keep them in the trunk for future use. Great product!!!
customer_reviews.author: elaine k profy

customer_reviews.title: Held up for 3 years during weekly grocery trips!
customer_reviews.text: We've used Clevermade baskets for about 3 years now, and recently ordered more. They last a long time if you care for them properly - we always make sure to fold them back after the shopping trips and wipe them down with wet wipes if they get dirty. These new ones are slightly smaller than the ones we had before but the fabric is tougher so it's a win!
customer_reviews.author: Luyou Sun

customer_reviews.title: Toot-Toot for the Tote
customer_reviews.text: I love my new grocery bag! The bright color helps me remember to take it into the store as I shop. I don't have to stop and pick up a basket anymore! I put my groceries on the belt as I check out and they are put right back in by the checker! I like that it is collapsible​ and can hold all of my purchases without a bag breaking. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jo E. St Clair

customer_reviews.title: Great, Sturdy, Useful!
customer_reviews.text: I’m obsessed with these. They pop out with a snap, store taking up minimal space and have handled lugging around multiple loads of miscellanies. I use for laundry, quick toy pickup, to store Cricut items and more. I’d imagine these would be great for shopping. I really want bigger ones for larger loads of laundry.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Got only one use....
customer_reviews.text: Used it only once and it broke. One of the side locking mechanisms broke when collapsing the basket. Update: I received a replacement. Used it once so far so good. My updated rating accounts for responsive customer service. Thank you Tom!
customer_reviews.author: Almo

customer_reviews.title: Reusable totes of the future.
customer_reviews.text: This is the future. So easy to use, store. I keep one in my pantry a few in my car and am constantly loaning them out to people who need a bag and they usually buy some for themselves after. Baggers at the store are always ooohing and awwwweing over these.
customer_reviews.author: Jody M. Farnsworth

customer_reviews.title: These baskets are fantastic! All the check out people love them
customer_reviews.text: These baskets are fantastic! All the check out people love them...stand up, easy to load, easy to put in basket and load into car. Do not fall over in car, much easier to carry into the house. I never go to the store that at least one person doesn't ask me where I found them. I originally bought 3, then added these 2. Very handy to carry picnic items also!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Mechanism in side isn't durable, but can be held up with the first item you put in it
customer_reviews.text: These are great because they hold themselves open, but a few months after some of the sides started to no longer lock in place. I still use them and it's been a few years now so I recommend them. You should just know the sides aren't durable, but can be held up with the first items you put in the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Best!
customer_reviews.text: This is the truly a clever product! It collapses for storage (fits between car seats) but is sturdy, lightweight and roomy for grocery, swimming pool, storing hobby or craft items etc. It also has a zippered pouch for cell phone and keys. Variety of colors! I am ordering these for all my friends for holiday and birthday gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Katems

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy basket that closes to flat and snaps open easily
customer_reviews.text: I really love these baskets, they snap open easily and store flat, as much as most carry bags are probably cheaper I really like that you can see contents of bag, most bags I use to carry I have to dig through to get things out, and the little zipper pocket is a plus, I am sure I will buy more !
customer_reviews.author: Lillian Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for groceries, beach items, sports, etc.
customer_reviews.text: I love how these compact and then pop into shape. I have received so many compliments on these bags. I use them to keep our vehicle organized with items we are using for a particular event. Extra shoes, jackets, towels. Perfect for any use.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne Costa

customer_reviews.title: VERSATILE & STURDY
customer_reviews.text: Cut a little piece of foam to fit the bottom & use basket to carry my 3 long haired Maltese to groomer, vet, etc, etc when our Oregon weather's too wet for leash walks. It's perfect depth for them to rest front paws along the top & see out. Its held up beautifully - still looks like new after plenty of rainy day trips!
customer_reviews.author: Mb

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel.
customer_reviews.text: I love using it for vacations. It is sturdy to pack food, and when it is empty...it is easy to fold up and show away.
customer_reviews.author: paula steinberger

customer_reviews.title: Good grocery basket
customer_reviews.text: I am, overall, very pleased with this basket! The stand up sides make loading groceries into it much easier than the canvas bags I used previously. The size is great. The little feet are nice; they keep the bottom dragging the ground and keep it in place in a grocery cart. My only complaint is that it doesn't stay "unsnapped" and flat after having been upright. One or both sides creep up, so it's not flat unless you put something on top to stop it from unfolding. This is a minor issue for me, but if the flatness is key for you, it might not be what you want.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for groceries
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these bags for everything but cans when I go grocery shopping. They snap open and hold their shape and hold a ton of produce, box goods, bakery items and paper goods. No more bags tipping over in the trunk. They are well made with a reinforced bottom with "feet" and the handles are sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Woodsey

customer_reviews.title: Easily break
customer_reviews.text: I love the idea of them they have so many possibilities you can use them for everything but they break so easily after one use one of the snap sides snapped. I did not have anything heavy in it or maybe it was broken when I got it and didnt realize!
customer_reviews.author: JAMAMOMMY1417

customer_reviews.title: great shopping bag
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bag for not only grocery shopping,but also to carry other things. We travel to our daughters, who lives in Maine(5 hr. trip for us) and I'm always looking for a bag to carry extra shoes, lightweight jackets, dry food goods, etc. This is perfect. I'll be purchasing more for myself and as gifts. I also like the knobs on the bottom of the bag. Haven't used it yet, but seems very sturdy and well made.
customer_reviews.author: D&R from RI

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Please bring back!
customer_reviews.text: So sorry these aren't available. Hope they return. I use them often and they have held up beautifully. I even can carry a load of fireplace wood in them easily. Please bring them back. My friends always ask where I got them so they can order.
customer_reviews.author: Louise

customer_reviews.title: Good design, many uses.
customer_reviews.text: This thing comes in handy! I love that it folds flat!
customer_reviews.author: DesignerGirl

customer_reviews.title: Great Totes!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter in college ordered these, I loved them so i ordered 3 for myself. My other daughter loved them so much I ordered 3 for her. The bees knees! Love how they fold up so conveniently!
customer_reviews.author: Paula B.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and convenient
customer_reviews.text: When Costco sold these a few years ago, I bought sets for each car as a convenient shopping basket. There are so many great uses and you can load them up with heavy items. Glad I found more and I love the different colors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super handy!
customer_reviews.text: I use these for school, car, groceries, etc. They hold a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Jacob E. Voyce

customer_reviews.title: These baskets are very handy to use.
customer_reviews.text: The bags are of good quality. We purchased a set previously and was extremely happy. This set was a little smaller in size. The bottom has a smaller size than the top. The baskets are a little tippy when they are bumped.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Sr from Illinois

customer_reviews.title: Really Cool Basket!  Very handy for shopping and at home for toting bulky items around the house.
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed with the SnapBasket. It's similar to the old market-baskets we grew up with. I've used it several times already. I think the construction is pretty clever, not sure how well the nylon is going to hold up. Only drawback is that it's made in China. I would be so much happier if it were at least made in North America, preferably in the US. I will say that I have ordered 3 more of these and 3 of the insulated baskets.
customer_reviews.author: Jennie Link

customer_reviews.title: Love the size and works great
customer_reviews.text: Can I have another please!!! Love the size and works great. I do reusable bag for my shopping and this one is perfect for my breads and soft stuff. Love the handles very easy to carry. Would be great for a picnic. Folds flat for easy storage. This is my first to use every week.
customer_reviews.author: dishgal

customer_reviews.title: FAST SHIPPING
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement for a unit three years old. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Brwyn

customer_reviews.title: Needed a more convenient bag to carry to local ball ...
customer_reviews.text: Needed a more convenient bag to carry to local ball parks - this was ideal and the small zipper compartment inside comes in handy as well
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell Harris

customer_reviews.title: No limit to their uses!!!
customer_reviews.text: I like that these fold and are so easy to clean. I do wish the bottoms were a little stronger, however. Love this product which are only to be matched by CleverMade’s foldable two handled rectangular baskets which I can no longer find!
customer_reviews.author: Gaye G. Spears

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend Amazing product.
customer_reviews.text: Love love love these baskets. No more grocery bags rolling around the car, no more wadded up cloth reusable bags jammed in a drawer or in a ball in the back of the car. Neat, stable, easy. I always get questions about them at the store, and people always asked the who makes them. I highly recommend them to anyone who asks. Don't think I could shop without them ever again.
customer_reviews.author: MissingSimCity

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shopping companions
customer_reviews.text: I love these shopping baskets and so do the naggers at my grocery store. Many have commented about how much easier they are to pack than regular cloth or plastic bags because they snap open with a flat bottom. I ordered one to try and then immediately ordered 3 more. I like how they fold flat for storage. Perfect! I'd like a thermally insulated version for summer shopping.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Moser

customer_reviews.title: Perfect errand bag
customer_reviews.text: I use this in the summer at the beach for errands - stores, farmers markets, picnics etc. I leave it on the golf cart and it goes in and out with me. Easy to clean. Durable. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Krissy

customer_reviews.title: Happy!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great basket. I haul tons of items around due to work and it’s made it so convenient to make one trip rather than several. It’s also nice that you can fold it, and tuck it away neatly on the side without taking up space. Down side to it is that it’s not made for heavy items. Besides that, I’m so happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: PTM

customer_reviews.title: Quality is a crapshoot
customer_reviews.text: I bought a 3 pack of these totes in May. One has worked well, one worked only once, and I have only used the third a couple of times. I really like shopping boxes for picking up a few items and where the stores don't provide arm baskets, but I wouldn't buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Great...for a very short time.
customer_reviews.text: I loved this when I received it. Perfect size, lightweight, easy to carry, and a great color. Now, less than 11 weeks later, it has worn out to the point that I probably won't be able to use it again. On one side, the folding support post has completely broken through the material. The other side looks like it will do the same eventually as well. I didn't even use it on a daily basis, nor did I overload it. I'm extremely disappointed in the quality (durability) of the fabric used. I wouldn't recommend this to anyone who wants something to use long-term.
customer_reviews.author: Hubert

customer_reviews.title: Great color and useful.
customer_reviews.text: I use these for laundry baskets. One can usually hold a weeks worth of my clothes. I like that they are light in themselves, and that they can fold flat. I am thinking of getting the larger size that can be used to transport Christmas presents.
customer_reviews.author: Chris nyc

customer_reviews.title: Sad purchaser
customer_reviews.text: I bought this basket in June and it is already broken, even though I have only used it a few times to carry groceries. The plastic snap in the side works fine, but the whole seam at the bottom ripped and the plastic piece came out. I can't figure out a way to repair it, and it is past 30 days so I can't return it, but in my mind it should have lasted more than 4 months. p.s. I contacted the supplier and they are sending me a new basket. I am completely changing my opinion and would order from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Norma J. Wolf

customer_reviews.title: I love these totes
customer_reviews.text: I love these totes! They are strong, easy to carry, and store well in the car. The bottom is sturdy and they don't fold up on their own. They are great for grocery shopping, traveling, and I even used them when moving.
customer_reviews.author: Darcy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Perfect size for a mom on the go bag. It makes it even better because it folds flat for storage.
customer_reviews.author: morgan erk

customer_reviews.title: Love SnapBaskets and recommend them to everyone
customer_reviews.text: Love SnapBaskets and recommend them to everyone. I use them for the grocery store, the farmer's market, and for quick trips through Coscto. No more produce getting squished and bruised in a standard bad. I love that they collapse so flat. I prefer the 30L over the 40L simply because I overload the 40L and have trouble carrying it.
customer_reviews.author: Auntie M

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shopping companion
customer_reviews.text: If you live in California (where you are charged for a bag when you go shopping) this is a great option! They fit in carts well, or you can use as your hand cart as you shop (that’s what I do). Love love love these. Perfect size, collapsible, and well made.
customer_reviews.author: SweetRosie

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we needed
customer_reviews.text: Great basket. I use it for light trips or when shopping with my wheelchair bound mother so she can hold things. Don't know how we lived without it
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Stout

customer_reviews.title: These bags are great for just about anything you need
customer_reviews.text: These bags are great for just about anything you need. During grocery shopping trips, my bread and chips don't get squashed when loaded into these bags.
customer_reviews.author: Ang

customer_reviews.title: I never liked the canvas type floppy bags because you have to ...
customer_reviews.text: I never liked the canvas type floppy bags because you have to use one hand to hold it open and the other to stuff it with your groceries. Thus I think the box boys/girls at grocery stores dislike those floppy bags. This thing is the cat's meow. Holds a load, too.
customer_reviews.author: James Dory

customer_reviews.title: Good for stationary storage!
customer_reviews.text: Use this in my truck to be more organized. It’s bigger than I thought and works for what I am using it for.
customer_reviews.author: Britt

customer_reviews.title: Cannot Wait to Get More!!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great bag. I keep it in my car and take it with me to the grocery store. I cannot believe how much can fit in here. It is very sturdy and the weight distributes really well so it is easy to carry even when super full. This puts the reusable grocery bags to shame. I cannot wait to get more.
customer_reviews.author: Erin B.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect bags, I love how they stay open and they seem to be holding up very well!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Fussell

customer_reviews.title: Very Practical!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! Convenient, sturdy and the perfect size for grocery trips and many other things. They are easy to open for use and close flat for out of the way storage.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Was very pleased with my purchases in the beginning
customer_reviews.text: Was very pleased with my purchases in the beginning. Within 1 month, the elastic that keeps the totes from popping open had stretched out to the point that when picked up, they would pop open. 2 weeks ago, the braces on 1 side of one of the bags just folded. It will not stay upright. Not sure I'll replace them again.
customer_reviews.author: Selena Camp

customer_reviews.title: Great Bags
customer_reviews.text: These are great bags. The only drawback that I can see is that they might not last too long. The material is not as sturdy as I would have expected for a 5-star review. If/when these wear out I will look for canvas.
customer_reviews.author: **csp**

customer_reviews.title: Love!!
customer_reviews.text: I really like everything about these bags I use it to go grocery shopping as a hamper and sometimes just as a tote to take stuff for my kids from the house to the car.
customer_reviews.author: Leanna & Liam

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Used it on a road trip for easy access to snacks and whips or anything we needed accessible. Worked perfect and storage is nice as it folds up and takes up no space in the closet.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Brown

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy enough
customer_reviews.text: I needed a more heavy duty carrier than this one. Also, sides collapse if bumped when full. It says no more than 25 pounds; believe it! Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Brun Hilda

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to store and love the feature of the metal part in the sides. Makes it stand up nicely and then can retract it for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Fiebs

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, I would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves these. I bought some for a guys fishing trip, but I think my wife just stole them. I'm going to have to order some more. They seem to be of fair quality and should hold things that aren't too heavy without a problem. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Size, durability are excellent.
customer_reviews.text: Love these bags!!! So many different uses. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnn Sedlak

customer_reviews.title: Best Shopping Bags!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these baskets! No more need to keep clumsy reusable bags! These collapse and strap together and store easily in the car - and the shopping cart. They hold a ton of groceries so I don't have to make multiple trips from the car. Buying as gifts as everyone loves them!
customer_reviews.author: coffeesnob45

customer_reviews.title: Clever snap basket
customer_reviews.text: The snap mechanism makes this basket so special. Keeps it up right when in use and folds slim when not.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Mar., Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product but wrong color
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a charcoal bag with cream belts but received a charcoal bag with blue belts. Since there is no such option on the product page I guess I'm not the only one who received this with the wrong color.
customer_reviews.author: yt86yt

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love the size. It is super light & folds easily & fits almost anywhere. Even has zippered pocket inside to hold shopping coupons. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Very handy collapsible bag
customer_reviews.text: This bag is really neat. I got it because it stays open like a basket yet is light-weight and can be collapsed if needed. It is large enough to hold many books or whatever and is pretty heavy duty. Measurements 18long x11.5wide x11high. I also bought the cloth covered bag by the same company and like that one a lot, too.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: I am loving how easy this Snap Basket is to use
customer_reviews.text: I am loving how easy this Snap Basket is to use! I ordered the three pack, kept two and gave one to a friend. I use it to pick up the veggies from our CSA farm share. It's perfect for easily loading the veggies in the open basket. Looks like it will be easy to clean. Very happy with this purchase so far!
customer_reviews.author: MIchigan Mom

customer_reviews.title: but it snaps into place and works like a dream
customer_reviews.text: I use it for my knitting supplies. Wasn't sure how well it would stand up, but it snaps into place and works like a dream. I only use it for yarn, so I can not give testimony for its durability with larger items.
customer_reviews.author: Elle Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Great basket.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great basket! Light weight but at the same time well made! I use it for groceries in the car as well as foldable things in the lawndry room around the house with crafts staffs and when opening mail so everything stays tidy and organized.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: First one Poorly constructed, but replaced
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for 5 months of minimal use. Then, the plastic collapsing mechanism fell out through a tear in the material at the bottom stitching. A quick email to CleverMade resulted in a nice apology and a full replacement.
customer_reviews.author: amzbyr

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this basket. Great for groceries like bread, chips etc.
customer_reviews.author: catherine I mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: These are great for the back of the SUV and for keeping right outside the door for stuff that is coming/going to school.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: i love it  for bringing things up and down stairs
customer_reviews.text: Its great for bringing things up and down stairs. I've used it a lot because I keep my canning in the basement. It is strong! Up and down with full jars or empty jars is made easier.. PLUS it folds flat
customer_reviews.author: Consumer Advocate

customer_reviews.title: Very very sturdy when open
customer_reviews.text: Where have these been all my life? I need dozens!! Very very sturdy when open. Very flat when closed. Love these!
customer_reviews.author: Patti

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this product, as it is the perfect fold flat tote she was looking for. She uses it for grocery or other shopping. Good build quality, and shipped quick.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Keenan

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Very useful little item for light shopping purposes. Folds up small for storage.
customer_reviews.author: EGM

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great for use in the car and for use with carrying laundry!
customer_reviews.author: B. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great tote, hold a lot. seems strong. 9X12 cake pan fits nicely with extra room for other things.
customer_reviews.author: Katheryn H.

customer_reviews.title: I'm very pleased with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I use these totes to carry my yarn and crochet projects. It's light weight and carries quite a bit. I'm very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Georgiana B.

customer_reviews.title: Convenient, easy to expand and collapse.
customer_reviews.text: Convenient, really handy size, easy to expand and collapse. Haven't used it enough to assess durability yet.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Brought all my Thanksgiving food in this (it didn't need ...

customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I needed. I have an embroidery machine and needed something to carry the 5 of the thread boxes plus other sundry supplies and this was the perfect size!

customer_reviews.text: I'm very satisfied with this purchase. These totes are exactly as advertised. I used them when I grocery shopped, and absolutely love them. They're roomy, strong and they look good!

customer_reviews.title: Not so great after a year...
customer_reviews.text: Update... Within a year one of the plastic frames snapped and all 6 of the baskets tore on the bottom. I love theses so much I came back for another set. Perfect for the back of my SUV to prevent groceries from tipping over.

product_meta.title: CleverMade SnapBasket Reusable Grocery Shopping Bag - Large Eco-Friendly Durable Collapsible Tote with Reinforced Bottom, Navy/Cream
product_meta.description: The Clever Made Snap Basket is a smart, space-saving solution to simplify all of your shopping trips and day-to-day activities for an on-the-go lifestyle. It was designed to help the environment as plastic bags from the grocery store are not eco friendly. These baskets can be used for so much more than grocery shopping too! Both men and women use them for produce at the farmers market, travelling in your car or SUV for weekend road trips, bringing lunch to work, loading up food for a summer BBQ, and in so many other ways. You can even load it full of dirty clothes and take it to the laundromat. Perfect for active moms bringing snacks for sporting events or for college students who take advantage of it being foldable for their small dorm room, apartment or condo. Durable handles can hold heavy loads up to 25 pounds of groceries, books, yoga gear, towels or linens. There are 2 of our patented SnapHinge in each utility tote and you'll love the sound they make when they pop-up and fold down. The checkers and baggers at the grocery store are going to love them too as they don't have to struggle to keep them standing up when you check out. If you're in need of a bag that's portable and can fold flat for compact storage then look no further!
feature_bullets: Say goodbye to plastic bags and hello to premium snap-up market totes that stay open when loading groceries with our patented SnapHinges
A flop-free design, rigid bottom and stability feet help give the basket structure at checkout and keep it upright on your kitchen counter
The zipper pocket holds keys, credit cards or your cell phone and is great for the beach, pool, picnics, laundry and the farmer's market
Designed with strong rip-stop polyester fabric for extreme durability and water resistance; folds down to 1.3" for storage in your trunk
Measuring 18.5" L x 11.75" W x 11.5" H, it holds 30 liters (8 gallons) by volume, with a maximum load capacity of 25 pounds

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars315 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
